tweets.text:
Bitcoin is at $91,000

Two weeks ago it was at $106,000

I'm buying more.

I got $75 in DraftKings gift cards for Christmas.

Turned that into $150.

Having fun with your 8% returns in the stock market, boomers.

I am in my 20s. I have 2 nice watches.

- Grand Seiko
- Rolex

I did not go into debt to buy them.

If you're a guy in your 20s buy Costco hotdogs

Go into debt if you have to

Just set up the bank accounts with my wife (we got married earlier this month)

- Joint savings for household
- Joint checking for monthly income + bills
- Her checking account
- My checking account
How long is your commute to work?

I told my wife that the money I invest in the stock market today is not going to be touched for at least 15+ years.

A long term mindset is why I will win in the stock market.
Ran some numbers & 40 year old me is gonna be pretty happy where he is financially
My Christmas present to me is an extra $200 invested this week in the stock market
